article_title: Mali Reports New Ebola Case, Linked To Dead Nurse
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: mali, reports, new, ebola, case, linked, dead, nurse

og.description: A friend of a nurse who died from Ebola earlier this month in Mali's capital, Bamako, has now fallen ill with the disease.
